    Shipping Method

    Please note:

    Only USPS can deliver to a PO Box, so the value shipping option may not be available based on your shipping address. If you would like to use our value shipping option, please try an alternate physical shipping address instead.
    Value Shipping
    typically arrives within 5 to 10 business days

    Please enter your zip code to see additional shipping options
    Freight Only

    Items you have selected must be shipped via freight. This may delay the delivery of all items in your order, even if some do not need to be shipped via freight. We will prepare a quote and contact you with the amount due. More information on shipping methods and answers to many frequently asked shipping questions can be found in our Shipping Policy.

    Due to the size of your order, please contact us to arrange for expedited shipping options. We will provide you a shipping quote, where applicable, and do our best to get your order processed as quickly as possible.

    Product Shipping Restriction

    The items listed cannot be shipped based on your state (billing/shipping address) restrictions, so these items will be removed from your cart. Please update your billing/shipping information or select 'Continue checkout' to see an updated order summary and total. You can also read our policies to find out more information about shipping restrictions.


    Order Update - Product Shipping Restriction

    Unfortunately, we cannot ship the following products in your cart to you due to restrictions imposed by the manufacturer:
    These items will be removed from your cart. You can browse our site for alternatives, or contact us and our team would be happy to suggest replacements.
    These items will be removed from your cart, and you may now proceed to checkout with your remaining items. If you are interested in possible replacements for the removed items, please contact us and we will be happy to assist you.

    Avoid delays – make sure your billing name, address and phone appear exactly as they do on your current credit card billing statement.
    We have detected that you are using a debit card. Just a heads up, your card issuer may place a soft hold on the funds for the dollar amount of the order, but this is not an actual charge. Please proceed (and don't worry), we won't charge your card until the items are ready to ship! Read more about our shipping and payment policies here.
    Credit Card Processing Temporarily Unavailable
    We are sorry, but our credit/debit card processor is temporarily unavailable. You can either use an alternative payment method listed below or place your order without payment details. If you elect to proceed without providing payment details, we will contact you to arrange payment. Feel free to Contact Us with any questions.
    Please note: orders will not be processed until payment is provided.
    Your Browser is Outdated
    OpticsPlanet utilizes industry-leading technology to ensure every transaction is secure and your information is protected. Unfortunately, your browser does not support all of the necessary security features to complete your order. We've disabled the payment section accordingly. Please try again using a different browser, call us at +1-800-504-5897 so we can take your order securely over the phone,, or simply checkout without adding any payment information and we will call you to confirm the order and get your payment information.
    Credit Card Processing Temporarily Unavailable
    Some versions of Firefox may have issues with our credit card input fields. If you are experiencing this issue, please use an alternative browser to complete this transaction, or use an alternative payment method. We are working on a fix for this issue and sincerely apologize for the inconvenience! Please Contact Us if you have any questions or would like help completing this order.
